summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Workday Insider Trading Tracker MVP. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly with successful SEC EDGAR integration.
passed_tests: All 4 backend API endpoints (GET /api/transactions, POST /api/transactions/refresh, GET /api/stats, GET /api/executives)
Frontend dashboard loads with all 4 stat cards displaying correct data
Refresh button successfully fetches fresh SEC EDGAR data and updates display
Transaction table displays with proper columns and transaction type badges
Filter buttons (All, Sales Only, Purchases Only) correctly filter transactions
Tab switching between 'All Transactions' and 'By Executive' views works
Executive Summary tab shows aggregated data per executive
Toast notifications appear on successful data refresh
Data persistence in MongoDB after refresh
Transaction type badges show 'Sale' in red and 'Purchase' in default color
Currency formatting and number formatting working correctly
